quote: The root of all virtue and grace, of all faith and acceptable worship, is that we know that we have nothing but what we receive, and bow in deepest humility to wait upon God for it.
quote_letters: THE ROOT OF ALL VIRTUE AND GRACE OF ALL FAITH AND ACCEPTABLE WORSHIP IS THAT WE KNOW THAT WE HAVE NOTHING BUT WHAT WE RECEIVE AND BOW IN DEEPEST HUMILITY TO WAIT UPON GOD FOR IT
